content: NPR 32 XL-22 Pipe press tool Heavy-duty cordless pistol-grip press tool compatible with interchangeable 32 kN press jaws and rings (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Pipe press tools, cutters, and crimpers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Minimize downtime and liability risks – Hilti hydraulic press tools can access our yearly certification and free tool inspection services to better protect you from leakages Peace of mind – compatibility with leading pipe system suppliers of both press tool and press jaws (including ProPress®) All-in-one versatility – NPR 32 XL-22 has the pressing power and diameter range suitable for virtually any pipe fitting More comfortable handling – 350° head rotation, contoured grip and balanced weight make the pipe press easier to control in any position On the Nuron battery platform – cordless press tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, higher quality jaws and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Pressing range up to 108 mm for steel pipes* Pressing range up to 108 mm for copper pipes* Pressing range up to 110 mm for plastic pipes* Pressing range up to 2 for ProPress® stainless steel pipes* Pressing range up to 2 for PureFlow® PEX pipes* ### TECHNICAL DATA: Press force: 32 kN For use with jaws: NPR PS standard press jaws;NPR PR press rings;NPR PA actuator Pressing capacity metal pipes: 4-1/4 in Technical Data | Press force | 32 kN | For use with jaws | NPR PS standard press jaws;NPR PR press rings;NPR PA actuator | Pressing capacity metal pipes | 4-1/4 in | Pressing capacity plastic pipes | 4-11/32 in | Head rotation | 350 ° | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 20.6 x 4.1 x 14.6 in | Service interval | 15.000 cycles or 1 year ### ITEMS- 2320251 - Cordl. press tool NPR 32 XL-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR 32 XL-22 Cordl. press tool
